name: bbb
description: 1. `npm install http-server` 1. `./node_modules/.bin/http-server .` 1. `sudo apt-get install nodejs npm` 1. `cd $RT_HOME` 1. `npm init` 1. Just press enter after each of the prompts 1. `npm install gulp` 1. `npm install --save-dev autoprefixer` 1. `npm install --save-dev postcss-advanced-variables` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-concat` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-postcss` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-cssimport` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-clean-css` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-watch` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-shell` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-tar-path` 1. `npm install --save-dev gulp-gzip` 1. `npm install --save-dev fancy-log`
